Sentencas: This paper reports on the synthesis of 20mol% Gd2O3-doped CeO2 solid solution (20 GDC) nano-particles via carbonate co-precipitation.
Titulo: Carbonate co-precipitation of Gd2O3-doped CeO2 solid solution nano-particles

Sentencas: Precursors and calcined particles were characterized using TGA, XRD, BET, FESEM, and TEM.
Titulo: Carbonate co-precipitation of Gd2O3-doped CeO2 solid solution nano-particles

Sentencas: From the diffraction pattern using XRD with TEM, it was shown that the Gd3+ replaced the Ce4+ lattice in the fluorite structure (FCC) Of CeO2, as opposed to it being a second phase in the CeO2 structure.
Titulo: Carbonate co-precipitation of Gd2O3-doped CeO2 solid solution nano-particles

Sentencas: The 20 GDC particles were calcined at 700degreesC for 2 h, and sintered to >99% density at a very low sintering temperature of 1150degreesC for 4 It.
Titulo: Carbonate co-precipitation of Gd2O3-doped CeO2 solid solution nano-particles
Carbonate co-precipitation of Gd2O3-doped CeO2 solid solution nano-particles
Carbonate co-precipitation of Gd2O3-doped CeO2 solid solution nano-particles
